oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gay Street
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thompson Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gay Street looking north, Knoxville, TN. 1932. At left: Billiards, Lane Drug Store, Heins Jewelers, Pagies Beauty Shoppe, F.W. Woolworth Co., Orchid Beauty Shoppe, Millers, Ritz Theatre, Kress, Strand Theatre. At right: Sterchi Furniture, Hall's, Union Bus Terminal, Hope's Jewelers, Szabo, Riviera Theatre (closed for the summer), Fidelity Banker's Trust Company, Royal Jewelers. Cars parked on street. Mailbox in median strip.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Streets; Business enterprises; Automobiles; Motion picture theaters; Mailboxes;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
